addNewUser: INSERT INTO [dbo].[SYSTEM_USER] (USER_ID, USER_GROUP_ID, BRANCH_GROUP_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_LOGIN, USER_PASSWORD, USER_PASSWORD_FAILED, USER_PASSWORD_SETON, URC_CODE, USER_ID_REF, USER_ID_REF2, USER_ACTIVE_START, USER_ACTIVE_END, USER_ISLOGON, USER_ISLOGON_DATE, USER_ISLOGON_IP, USER_STATUS, USER_CREATED_BY, USER_CREATED_DATE, USER_CREATED_TIME, USER_UPDATED_BY, USER_UPDATED_DATE, USER_UPDATED_TIME, USER_APPROVED_BY, USER_APPROVED_DATE, USER_APPROVED_TIME, USER_REJECTED_BY, USER_REJECTED_DATE, USER_DELETED_BY, USER_DELETED_DATE, USER_DELETED_TIME) VALUES (@USER_ID,@USER_GROUP_ID,@BRANCH_GROUP_CODE,@BRANCH_CODE,@USER_NAME,@USER_LOGIN,@USER_PASSWORD,@USER_PASSWORD_FAILED,@USER_PASSWORD_SETON,@URC_CODE,@USER_ID_REF,@USER_ID_REF2,@USER_ACTIVE_START,@USER_ACTIVE_END,@USER_ISLOGON,@USER_ISLOGON_DATE,@USER_ISLOGON_IP,@USER_STATUS,@USER_CREATED_BY,@USER_CREATED_DATE,@USER_CREATED_TIME,@USER_UPDATED_BY,@USER_UPDATED_DATE,@USER_UPDATED_TIME,@USER_APPROVED_BY,@USER_APPROVED_DATE,@USER_APPROVED_TIME,@USER_REJECTED_BY,@USER_REJECTED_DATE,@USER_DELETED_BY,@USER_DELETED_DATE,@USER_DELETED_TIME)
